name: QiQi
title: Icy Resurrection
description: An apprentice and herb-picker Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

normalattack.name: Ancient Sword Art
normalattack.description: Performs up to five rapid strikes. When charged, unleashes two rapid strikes.

elementalskill.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
elementalskill.description: Invokes the Herald of Frost and deals Cryo DMG to nearby enemies. When Herald of Frost is on the field, Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks help regenerate all party member's HP and the enchantment following Qiqi around deals Cryo DMG.

elementalburst.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
elementalburst.description: Creates Fortune-Preserving Talisman that deals Cryo DMG and helps Qiqi regain health from injured opponents.

passivetalent1.name: Former Life Memories
passivetalent1.description: Resources only found in Liyue are marked on the mini-map.

passivetalent2.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
passivetalent2.description: When a character triggers an Elemental Reaction while the Herald of Frost is in play, the Incoming Healing Bonus increases by 20% for 8s.

passivetalent3.name: A Glimpse into Arcanum
passivetalent3.description: When Qiqi hits enemies with Normal and Charged Attacks, she has a 50% chance to apply Fortune-Preserving Talisman to them for 6s. This can only occur once every 30s.

constellations.d1: When the Herald of Frost hits an enemy marked by a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.
constellations.d2: Qiqi's Normal and Charge Attack DMG against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.
constellations.d3:
Increases the Level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d4: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.
constellations.d5:
Increase the Level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
constellations.d6:
Using Adeptus Art: Preserve of Fortune revives all nearby fallen characters and regenerates 50% of their HP. 
 This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

profile.description: "Blessed" by the adepti with a body that cannot die, this petite zombie retains her original appearance as a child. Who knows how old she really is...Zombies must have orders before they can do anything. Somehow Qiqi ended up responsible for giving orders to herself.Qiqi's memory is like a sieve. Out of necessity, she always carries around a notebook.Despite how problematic her memory may be, she is actually quite well-equipped to get through the day: she can use orders to force herself to complete tasks; if she forgets anything, she can look at her notebook for a reminder; and if any task proves difficult, her incredible strength can help solve many problems.Recently, she has also added a section on "brain training" and "mnemonic methods." Her notebook is a becoming a true "dummy's guide" on just about anything.But on her worst days, she even forgets to look at her notebook...If while in the mountains of Liyue you see someone bumping into things, walking in circles, or chasing squirrels that don't exist, it is almost certainly to be the adorable undead herb gatherer. If she seems to be struggling, please lend a helping hand! "I am Qiqi. I am a zombie. And I forgot what comes next."

zhdescription: 药庐“不卜庐”的采药姑娘兼学徒，面色苍白如纸的不死之人。话很少，也没有什么表情。曾因“仙缘”而拥有了被凡间称作僵尸的不死之身，外表永远停留在了逝去那年，年龄不可考。
zhtitle: 冻冻回魂夜、不卜庐采药人

zhnormalattack.name: 云来古剑法
zhnormalattack.description:
普通攻击
进行至多五段的连续剑击 

重击 
消耗一定体力，瞬间向前方挥出两剑

zhelementalskill.name: 仙法寒病鬼差
zhelementalskill.description:
冰血化符，召唤寒病鬼差，并对周围的敌人造成冰元素伤害。 
寒病鬼差 ·七七的普通攻击与重击命中时，为自己的队伍中所有角色,以及附近的友方角色恢复生命值,回复量受益于七七的攻击力; ·每隔一段时间，为当前角色恢复生命值; ·跟随角色行动，对路径上的敌人造成冰元素 伤害。

zhelementalburst.name: 仙法·救苦度厄
zhelementalburst.description: 七七释放体内封印的仙力,以度厄真符标记附近的敌人，并造成冰元素伤害。 度厄真符 处于度厄真符影响下的敌人受到伤害时，为造成伤害的角色恢复生命值。

zhpassivetalent1.name: 延命妙法
zhpassivetalent1.description: 处于仙法·寒病鬼差状态下的角色触发元素反应时，受治疗加成提升20%,持续8秒。

zhpassivetalent2.name: 玉签偶开
zhpassivetalent2.description: 七七的普通攻击与重击命中敌人时，有50%的几率为敌人添加一枚度厄真符，持续6秒。该效果每30秒只能触发一次。

zhpassivetalent3.name: 前尘旧忆
zhpassivetalent3.description: 在小地图上显示周围的璃月区域特产的位置。

zhconstellations.d1: 寒病鬼差命中被度厄真符标记的敌人时，为七七恢复2点元素能量。
zhconstellations.d2: 对受到冰元素影响的敌人，七七的普通攻击与重击造成的伤害提升15%。
zhconstellations.d3: 仙法·救苦度厄的技能等级提高3级。至多提升至15级。
zhconstellations.d4: 被度厄真符标记的目标，攻击力下降20%。
zhconstellations.d5: 仙法·寒病鬼差的技能等级提高3级。 至多提升至15级
zhconstellations.d6: 施放仙法·救苦度厄时，复苏附近所有倒下的角色，并将其生命值恢复至50%。该效果每15分钟只能触发一次。
